effect.shortEffect: Doubles damage inflicted with not-very-effective moves.
effect.full: This Pokémon deals twice as much damage with moves that are not very effective against the target.

description.sun-moon: The Pokémon can use “not very effective” moves to deal regular damage.
description.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: The Pokémon can use “not very effective” moves to deal regular damage.
description.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: The Pokémon can use “not very effective” moves to deal regular damage.
description.sword-shield: The Pokémon can use “not very effective” moves to deal regular damage.
